text: Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa on ci nozil kardai, dar Incil imon ovardem va ʙa pajomʙarat Iso alajhissalom pajravi namudem. Moro ʙinavis az cumlai on kasone, ki Turo ʙa jagonagiat va ʙarhaq ʙudani risolai pajomʙaronat, guvohi medihand. (Va on guvohidihandagon ummatoni Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam meʙosand)
